# Create Create ExampleClass Object
## Description
Create a new entity of the ExampleClass class.

## Inputs
* **ExampleClass** (Any): ExampleClass class object as provided by the output of the component "ExampleClass" from the category "Classes". 
* **name** (String): Set the attribute "name" of the ExampleClass entity.
* **amount** (Integer): Set the attribute "amount" of the ExampleClass entity.
* **value** (Float): Set the attribute "value" of the ExampleClass entity.

## Outputs
* **example_class_object** (Any): ExampleClass entity with the attributes set to the corresponding input values.

## Details
It is not possible to execute the component on its own, but only in the context of a workflow, where the **ExampleClass** is provided by the component "ExampleClass" from the category "Classes".
name: Create ExampleClass Object
